title: Remove onOnline usage
description: Consider removing the deprecated onOnline callback usage in favor of subscribing to connection.state. The onOnline callback may be deprecated in future Zero versions.

title: Deprecate online getter
description: Mark the simple boolean online getter as deprecated in favor of the new connection.state API which provides richer connection status information

title: Fix Query type parameter order for Zero 0.25
description: Zero 0.25 changed Query type parameter order from Query<TSchema, TTable, TReturn> to Query<TTable, TSchema, TReturn>. Update library to match new order.

title: Update demo and docs for Zero 0.25
description: Update the demo app and documentation to use the latest Zero 0.25 patterns and code styles, including new query/mutator APIs and connection status

title: Add Connection State Support
description: Expose zero.connection and add connectionState getter for the new richer connection status API (connecting/connected/disconnected/error/needs-auth) from Zero 0.25

title: Support DefaultSchema type for automatic schema inference
description: Update type parameters to use DefaultSchema as the default value instead of Schema. This allows users who register their schema via module augmentation (declare module '@rocicorp/zero' { interface DefaultTypes { schema: typeof schema; } }) to use Z and Query classes without explicit generic parameters. Non-breaking change - users can still explicitly pass schema type if preferred.
